MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Little Sutton, affecting properties in Cedar Avenue, Maple Avenue and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an underground cable fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:05PM on 2nd December 2020
